pkgmetadata.longdescription: Linux non-fuse read/write kernel driver for the exFAT, FAT12, FAT16 and vfat (FAT32) file systems. Originally ported from Android kernel v3.0. Android ARM Linux non-fuse read/write kernel driver for exFat and VFat Android file systems. Not updated, but work just fine (fixed for kernel 5.x)
